classification.context_str: Product space clusters from the HS92 product space
HS92 product classification data with hierarchical relationships. Includes product codes, names, and descriptions.
Product space edges from the HS92 product space
Country-level data with names, codes, and hierarchical information.
Maps countries to groups and defines country memberships.
HS12 product classification data with hierarchical relationships. Includes product codes, names, and descriptions.
Data about groups of countries or regions, with hierarchy.
SITC product classification data. Includes product codes, names, and descriptions.
Classification of products in unilateral service trade. Includes services-type product codes, names, and descriptions. Use this for unilateral (single country level) service trade data.
Classification of products in bilateral service trade. Includes services-type product codes, names, and descriptions. Use this for bilateral (country to country level) service trade data.
